sentences.sContent: The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boil on my right arm rankled whenever I wrote.
sentences.sCn: 每当我写字的时候，右臂上的疖子就使我感到疼痛。

sentences.sContent: Shops are no longer allowed to push up their prices whenever they want.
sentences.sContent_eng: Shops are no longer allowed to push up their prices whenever they want.
sentences.sCn: 再不允许商店想什么时候提价就提价了。
